For over 100 years audiences have struggled to understand our braw brogue: silent Harry Lauder films attempted an accent in the captions, and in Hollywood's golden era , everyone wanted to paint their tonsils tartan- but as examples from Katharine Hepburn, Orson Welles and Richard Chamberlain show, they couldnae. The rise of radio. The jazz big bands. The legendary clubs and ballrooms. The soundtracks of the great musical films and TV shows. Sex and romance, gangsters, luxury cars and palm trees. From Barcelona to New York, with a stop in Cuba. The birth of Las Vegas. The sound of the maracas. Chihuahuas everywhere. The incredible life story of Xavier Cugat (1900-90).","popularity":4.815,"poster_path":"/2Pupu1b9rFXF9yUoNWeFIgOXtXW.jpg","release_date":"2016-05-02","title":"Sex, Maracas \u0026 Chihuahuas","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":870244,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Better Living Through Chemistry","overview":"In the 1970s, Dr. Alexander “Sasha” Shulgin significantly contributed to the development and psychopharmaceutical use of MDMA: a catalyst to personal doors entombed or unknown. His widow, co-author, and research partner, Ann—alongside friends, family, and colleagues—gives a guided tour of their life and laboratory, reflecting on how risks and revelations opened a world of compound enlightenment. Stippled with spirituality, sadness, and skepticism, the Shulgins’ chemical love story examines the power of psychedelic psychotherapy, sacred alchemy, and challenging the path of misunderstood resistance.","popularity":2.329,"poster_path":"/s7dmGGdidU98jOcOz6INHbcsU1L.jpg","release_date":"2021-09-21","title":"Better Living Through Chemistry","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":713685,"original_language":"sv","original_title":"Business Class","overview":"Swedish documentary from 1988 about one of the 80's era phenomena: yuppies. Through Tomas Dillén's documentary, we get to meet some young entrepreneurs and financial boys whose goal is to become successful millionaires.","popularity":0.578,"poster_path":"/5vbsdBBxngM5nbYjIdOm9imPzXJ.jpg","release_date":"1988-01-01","title":"Business Class","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/eSSDhKjp0zqBZjm9dKZTy0r0M5p.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":1183184,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Stock Aitken Waterman: Legends of Pop","overview":"Mike Stock, Matt Aitken and Pete Waterman were the producers who came, SAW and conquered the UK charts in the 1980s, spinning the music scene right round like a record with their instantly recognisable brand of disco floor-filling pop hits. The trio divided the nation between those who loved their Hi-NRG sound and the singers they transformed into tabloid sensations, and a music press that loathed them for turning record producing into a production line.  Today, many of SAW’s most memorable hits are considered classics of their time, and the very best of them are celebrated in this new selection, featuring such artists as Rick Astley, Dead or Alive, Donna Summer,  Bananarama, Mel \u0026 Kim and, of course, Kylie and Jason","popularity":3.459,"poster_path":"/3tXwOAUIb6u2yrd59UN1Qs7Tegr.jpg","release_date":"2023-01-21","title":"Stock Aitken Waterman: Legends of Pop","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/vXDTfK9PgZmgJJqaZhZCO05qj1Z.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":718556,"original_language":"en","original_title":"TINSEL: The Lost Movie About Hollywood","overview":"A melancholy and affectionate look at the global obsession with movies, \"TINSEL - The Lost Movie About Hollywood\" was lost for 30 years and never shown publicly. An outside-in, inside-out view of the Motion Picture Industry circa 1990, it is a film about fame in general and the love of movies in particular. The film includes new footage offering perspective from the 21st century. The film examines the uncertain future the industry faces in its second century, as technology and new platforms change the movie-watching experience forever.","popularity":4.228,"poster_path":"/omskoa0pxIrAzPK8OcY5BQJuuhc.jpg","release_date":"2020-11-01","title":"TINSEL: The Lost Movie About Hollywood","video":false,"vote_average":8.5,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/6B0XYCRIXTbVOGfnOwkt86kLH6O.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":719062,"original_language":"en","original_title":"NB80s","overview":"A look at the NBA and its players during the 1980s, including the introduction of the 3-point shot, the transformation of the Los Angeles Lakers into \"Showtime,\" and the rivalry between Magic Johnson and Larry Bird. The Story of Anvil","overview":"At 14, best friends Robb Reiner and Lips made a pact to rock together forever. Their band, Anvil, hailed as the \"demi-gods of Canadian metal\" influenced a musical generation that includes Metallica, Slayer, and Anthrax. The Story of Anvil","video":false,"vote_average":7.611,"vote_count":245},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/iY0hbZdvAlEldyzPwVLcA8k9AfQ.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":879210,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Heval","overview":"When a British-born actor abandons his Hollywood career to volunteer to Join the Kurdish YPG to fight ISIS in Syria, many see him as a selfless hero battling America's most insidious enemy. But others think he's a hot-tempered narcissist, staging a publicity stunt to further his career - and when his service ends, neither the UK nor the US welcome him back. Through incisive interviews with the actor, his supporters, his detractors, and top-tier experts - and featuring the actor's own jaw-dropping helmet-cam video of deadly battles with and interrogations of ISIS fighters - Heval gives viewers unprecedented access into a war against evil and one man's controversial role in it.","popularity":0.886,"poster_path":"/xo0IjMSVS9cs59ULL0Zp2kIegtf.jpg","release_date":"2021-09-23","title":"Heval","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/iLomii5AQQaHJr1mni4c1v61Kqr.jpg","genre_ids":[16,99,36],"id":706716,"original_language":"lv","original_title":"Mans mīļākais karš","overview":"Ilze Burkovska, a little girl who is obsessed with stories of World War II and will be a filmmaker in a distant future, lives in Latvia under the totalitarian boot of the Soviets and the ominous shadow of the many menaces and horrors of the Cold War.","popularity":7.366,"poster_path":"/unMThLnf8dzep3tid4HZm9ny1q4.jpg","release_date":"2020-09-25","title":"My Favorite War","video":false,"vote_average":6.7,"vote_count":8},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":246219,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Hollywoodism: Jews, Movies and the American Dream","overview":"This film discusses the effect on how major American films in Hollywood were influenced by the Eastern European Jewish culture that most of the major movie moguls who controlled the studios shared. It's the end for a piece of history of Italian industry and also for a place of memory of workers' struggle: the movie documents the different reactions and scales of awareness determined by class belonging to the functions held in the factory by the interviewees.","popularity":2.978,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1987-01-01","title":"La fabbrica sospesa","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/7HB33fIF9nhAKxF61a0pA73cKbL.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":409069,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Fall","overview":"The Fall tells the remarkable story of a South African barefoot runner, an American track-and-field prodigy, and the events behind one of the most memorable moments in sporting history – the 1984 LA Olympics. The film charts two journeys, from rural South Africa under apartheid and the rolling hills of Southern California, to the starting line of the women’s 3,000 metres. It uncovers a tale of betrayal and exploitation, of the blurred lines between politics, media and sport, and of the dedication and sacrifice required to compete at the highest level. It’s a story that split governments and divided nations, but at its heart is a tale of two young women who, despite the turmoil in their lives, just wanted to run.","popularity":4.346,"poster_path":"/qz6FXPDobOutDB2bmjupjFtCxmJ.jpg","release_date":"2016-07-29","title":"The Fall","video":false,"vote_average":8.6,"vote_count":9},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/8PxclaFAhnSP0kYfwv9iC1cfMpr.jpg","genre_ids":[99,16,10751],"id":861197,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol","overview":"In this animated documentary, Los Angeles filmmaker Dion Labriola recounts his all-consuming childhood quest to contact his teen idol, Ike Eisenmann - and the magical turn of events that led him toward his goal (some 40 years later).","popularity":0.959,"poster_path":"/j53KFnpgQ07qxPYN6DJwBUPb5bY.jpg","release_date":"2021-08-13","title":"Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/k3DZulkuUDnAz43LYfM8J1OZS3t.jpg","genre_ids":[99,35],"id":545814,"original_language":"en","original_title":"How The Young Ones Changed Comedy","overview":"This documentary explores the legacy of one of the most notorious British sitcoms of all time. Launching alternative comedy onto our screens, the show made household names of its performers and writers and proved to be a huge influence, despite the BBC reportedly being baffled by what they'd commissioned back in 1982. Never before had a flagship comedy show contained so much violence, depravity and anarchy - it was a shot across the bow to mainstream comedians that things would never be the same again.","popularity":6.803,"poster_path":"/xCWtx7wuR5t0tTcgPc4TsqxruOW.jpg","release_date":"2018-05-26","title":"How The Young Ones Changed Comedy","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/zx3Iyo0iuE8SuT5xwE3TpNUAdor.jpg","genre_ids":[99,35],"id":574808,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Mel Brooks: Unwrapped","overview":"At the age of 91, Mel Brooks is unstoppable, with his musical \"Young Frankenstein\" opening to great critical acclaim in London in late 2017.
